info.name: Disqus Dark and Transparent
info.description: A dark, grey, transparent, and glowy themed style for all pages Disqus. It will theme all external discussion boxes on pages using the Disqus chat. Everything is commented, so you can easily change it.
info.additionalInfo:
Inspired by http://sssscomic.com and https://userstyles.org/styles/101293 . Comment here if anything is wrong.

Changelog: 
2016-03-04:
-forgot to remove .form background.

2016-03-01:
-Finally stop being a lazy slag and updated the slight colour changes they made to buttons, and certain fields. 

2015-03-19:
-Edited CSS to comply with site's latest update, changed some item's hover box-shadow to red, changed focused link's color to blue, and added a fuller box-shadow as suggested by Alexander V..
